question: Who has been named the Chairperson of the re-constituted ‘Commodity Derivatives Advisory Committee’ of SEBI?
explanation:
Securities Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has re-constituted its Commodity derivatives advisory committee. 
As per the recent notification, the 17-member committee would be chaired by retired IAS officer Ashok Dalwani. The committee examines issues related to contract designs and new products in the segment and advises on matters related to delivery mechanism and warehouses. The panel includes members from BSE, NSE, NCDEX NITI Aayog, NABARD among others.
